channel.title: Help with some easy stuff. rep++
channel.description:
Java\ItemDef.java:283: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "A piece of metal".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:283: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "A piece of metal".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:309: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "Colt .45m with a silencer".getBytes(); Ex amine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:309: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "Colt .45m with a silencer".getBytes(); Ex amine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:319: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "An attachment used to reduce the sound of your weapon.".getBytes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:319: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "An attachment used to reduce the sound of your weapon.".getBytes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:340: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "An attachment used to better your aiming on a gun.".getBytes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:340: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "An attachment used to better your aiming on a gun.".getBytes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:351: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all pistols.".getBytes(); Ex amine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:351: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all pistols.".getBytes(); Ex amine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:362: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all shotguns.".getBytes(); E xamine ^
Java\ItemDef.java:362: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all shotguns.".getBytes(); E xamine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:373: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all sniper rifles.".getBytes (); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:373: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all sniper rifles.".getBytes (); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:395: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all automatic rifles.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:395: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "Ammo used by all automatic rifles.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:408: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "An uzi with a silencer attachment.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:408: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "An uzi with a silencer attachment.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:421: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "An sub machinegun.".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:421: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "An sub machinegun.".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:434: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "An MP5 with a silencer attachment.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:434: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "An MP5 with a silencer attachment.".getBy tes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:447: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "A sub machinegun.".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:447: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "A sub machinegun.".getBytes(); Examine ^ Java\ItemDef.java:460: error: not a statement itemDef.description = "A dragunov with a 10x scope attachment.". getBytes(); Examine
^ Java\ItemDef.java:460: error: ';' expected itemDef.description = "A dragunov with a 10x scope attachment.". getBytes(); Examine
^ 26 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help with some easy stuff. rep++
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

use code tags, please.
and seeing as you don’t want to do anything but post the code, i’m just gonna post some links.

https://www.google.com/search?aq=0&oq=%22not+a+statement%22+&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=not+a+statement+error+in+java

http://www.coderanch.com/t/495450/java/java/Unexpected-error-not-statement-error

nice syntax.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with some easy stuff. rep++

item.title: Help with some easy stuff. rep++
item.dc:creator: @Dremorain Dremorain
item.description:
@Dremorain wrote:

dude, add a

; on the end of those lines.

gonna use this as an example

public static int thiefXpInc = 500; public static int slayerXpInc = 500; public static int combatXpInc = 1000; public static int magicXpInc = 1000; public static int rangedXpInc = 1000; public static int prayerXpInc = 750;

is what it needs to be
not

public static int thiefXpInc = 500 public static int slayerXpInc = 500 public static int combatXpInc = 1000 public static int magicXpInc = 1000 public static int rangedXpInc = 1000 public static int prayerXpInc = 750

Read full topic
item.source: Help with some easy stuff. rep++
